My hours were slashed, I was removed from the butcher department, I called in sick days in a row because I was having constant panic attacks and depressive episodes, I'm in debt to my bank because I went negative from rent check last month, I can't afford to pay rent which was due on the third, nobody on cragslist will buy any of my stuff so I'm going to kill myself.
